text: [Music]
here's what to make when you don't know
what to make for dinner
try tarragon chicken on a bed or sherry
onions because it's delicious so the
first step for this chicken is to
marinate it overnight if you can with
tarragon garlic and salt and pepper and
you can see I've used a lot of tarragon
here this is very green and that's
important because it gives it so much
flavor we tend not to use a lot of
tarragon here in North America but they
use it a lot in France and it's just got
this wonderful licorice green herbal
flavor and it really adds a lot to a
dish so I have a pan full of thinly
sliced onion the thinner you slice it
the browner it's gonna get so try to
slice it nice and thin olive oil salt
pepper so you want to spread your onions
out in one layer and then I'm just gonna
Nestle the chicken in one of the great
things about this dish is that when you
cook onions and chicken in the same pan
the chicken juices get all over the
onions and make them really rich and
then the onions steam just infuses the
chicken it's just beautiful we to add
more herbs right on top so more tarragon
and lots of time I'm going to roast this
for a little while and then about
halfway through the cooking time I'm
just going to stir it up to make sure
that the onions cook evenly you want to
toss them half way through and that way
they're going to get fully browned on
all sides so you know the onions will
have started to shrink as they cook and
so that'll be good because you'll be
able to spread them out a little more
evenly too as you toss them it's all
about the browned onions those brown
onions the herbs the chickens and then
back in the oven
I love to use dark me here because I
just love the rich flavor but if you're
more of a white meat person you can go
ahead and use the breast you just want
to take it off the pan a little bit
sooner because it cooks more quickly
that is what you're looking for golden
brown onions crispy chicken skin now I'm
just going to drizzle a little sherry
vinegar right over the top just to
mitigate the sweetness of all those
onions next time you're making a dish
and you think oh I'm going to add some
basil try tarragon instead it's a little
bit different but it's so flavorful
[Music]
